name: Superpowers
description:
[ABOUT]

This game was created for The Historically Accurate Game Jam with the theme "Cold War".

Created in Unity with C#.

Controls and Credits in game.

[FEATURES]
  • Fun characters with multiple attacks and abilities!
  • Local multiplayer with either keyboard or controller support!
  • Defeat your opponent to win the War!
  • Two stages.
  • 3 characters.
